questions: Q. 1. What is the meaning of concentration camps ?
answers: Ans. A prison where people are detained without due process of law.

questions: Q. 2. Why were Nghe An and Ha Tinh provinces called the electrical fuses of Vietnam ?
answers: Ans. Nghe An and Ha Tinh provinces of Vietnam were among the poorest and had an old radical tradition.
